name: Web Application
description: Full-stack web application project template with frontend, backend, database, and deployment phases

tasks.title: Project Setup and Repository Initialization
tasks.description: Initialize Git repository, set up project structure, configure linting and formatting tools (ESLint, Prettier), and establish CI/CD pipeline foundation

tasks.title: Requirements Analysis and Architecture Design
tasks.description: Document functional and non-functional requirements, create system architecture diagrams, define API contracts, and establish database schema design

tasks.title: UI/UX Design and Prototyping
tasks.description: Create wireframes, design mockups, establish design system (colors, typography, components), and build interactive prototypes

tasks.title: Database Design and Setup
tasks.description: Design relational schema, set up database server (PostgreSQL/MySQL), create migration scripts, and establish connection pooling

tasks.title: Backend API Development - Core Features
tasks.description: Implement RESTful/GraphQL API endpoints, authentication and authorization (JWT/OAuth), request validation, and error handling middleware

tasks.title: Backend API Development - Business Logic
tasks.description: Implement domain-specific business logic, service layer, data access layer, and integration with external APIs

tasks.title: Frontend Development - Core Components
tasks.description: Set up frontend framework (React/Vue/Angular), implement routing, authentication flows, and core UI components

tasks.title: Frontend Development - Feature Implementation
tasks.description: Implement main application features, integrate with backend APIs, state management setup, and form handling

tasks.title: Testing - Unit and Integration Tests
tasks.description: Write unit tests for backend services, frontend components, API integration tests, and achieve minimum 80% code coverage

tasks.title: Testing - E2E and Performance Testing
tasks.description: Implement end-to-end tests (Cypress/Playwright), load testing, and security vulnerability scanning

tasks.title: Deployment and DevOps Setup
tasks.description: Configure Docker containers, set up cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP/Azure), configure environment variables, and establish monitoring and logging

tasks.title: Documentation and Handover
tasks.description: Write API documentation, deployment guides, user manuals, and create developer onboarding documentation
